select ATHR_CD as athrCd ,ATHR_CON as athrCon ,ATHR_NM as athrNm ,USE_YN as useYn from itep.TB_IEP_CLA001C
where USE_YN=#{useYn}

select APLC_STG_CD as aplcStgCd , APLC_STG_NM as aplcStgNm , APLC_STG_DESC as aplcStgDesc , USE_YN as useYn from itep.TB_IEP_CLS001C
where USE_YN=#{useYn}

SELECT USER_ID AS userId, CONCAT(USER_NM,'(',USER_JTM,')') AS userNm, BRNM AS brnm FROM TB_IEP_CMU001M CMU LEFT JOIN TB_IEP_CMB001M CMB ON CMU.TEAM_CD = CMB.BRCD WHERE ATHR_CD ='DPM'
AND DVCD IN (SELECT DISTINCT DVCD FROM TB_IEP_CMU001M WHERE USER_ID =#{userId})
select BRCD as brcd , BRNM as brnm , HGRN_BRCD as hgrnBrcd from itep.TB_IEP_CMB001M where USE_YN = 'Y' and HGRN_BRCD = '0889'
